alert.note: Alert for Crane; Ector; Glasscock; Midland; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 9:30PM CST until February 16 at 10:15PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Glasscock County in western Texas... Southeastern Ector County in western Texas... Midland County in western Texas... Northeastern Crane County in western Texas... Upton County in western Texas... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 930 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Midland to Crane, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Midland, Odessa, Crane, Greenwood, Midland International Air and Space Port, Cotton Flat, Midkiff, Crane County Airport, Warfield, Midland Airpark, Skywest Airport, King Mountain, Spraberry, Pleasant Farms and Cordona Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 114 and 150. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
